de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.code

Class GwtCodeMirror

  • java.lang.Object

    public class GwtCodeMirror
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable, TextArea.IsTextArea, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasValueChangeHandlers<java.lang.String>
    A variation of the CodeMirror wrapper, adapted for GEWT.
    See Also:
    "https://github.com/protegeproject/codemirror-gwt"
